Class.name: GroupResult
Class.Description: The result of a call to `DynamicQueryable.GroupByMany()`.

Property.name: Key
Property.Description: The key value of the group.

Property.name: Key
Property.Description: The key value of the group.

Property.name: Count
Property.Description: The number of resulting elements in the group.

Property.name: Items
Property.Description: The resulting elements in the group.

Property.name: Subgroups
Property.Description: The resulting subgroups in the group.

Method.name: ToString
Method.Description: Returns a string showing the key of the group and the number of items in the group.
